headlines.description: For all of their possession, City were unable to create many meaningful attacks, and were held firm by a resilient Wolves side.
headlines.shortLinkText: Manchester City held to 1-1 draw at Wolves

headlines.description: Bournemouth fought back from two goals down to earn a 2-2 draw with Everton as both teams ended with 10 men.

video.headline: Bournemouth 2-2 Everton: Wild encounter ends level

tracking.trackingName: Bournemouth 2-2 Everton: Wild encounter ends level

headlines.shortLinkText: Richarlison sees red, Everton held by Bournemouth

headlines.description: Arsenal celebrated their first Premier League win of the season under new manager Unai Emery after coming from behind to beat West Ham.

video.headline: Welbeck seals win late on for Arsenal

tracking.trackingName: Welbeck seals win late on for Arsenal

headlines.shortLinkText: Emery gets first Arsenal win, 3-1 vs. West Ham

headlines.description: Huddersfield Town survived Jonathan Hogg's sending off to claim their first Premier League point of the season after a 0-0 draw against Cardiff.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huddersfield, Cardiff still winless after draw

video.headline: Huddersfield 0-0 Cardiff: Terriers claim first point

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Huddersfield 0-0 Cardiff: Terriers claim first point

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Defender Harry Maguire's stoppage-time goal gave Leicester City a hard-fought 2-1 Premier League victory over 10-man Southampton on Saturday.

video.headline: Leicester's Maguire scores winner deep in stoppage time

tracking.trackingName: Leicester's Maguire scores winner deep in stoppage time

headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester win at Saints after Maguire strike

headlines.description: Liverpool recorded their third successive Premier League victory after Mohamed Salah's goal was enough to beat Brighton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah scores as Liverpool edge past Brighton

video.headline: Liverpool 1-0 Brighton: Salah sends Reds top

tracking.trackingName: SINGAPORE Liverpool 1-0 Brighton: Salah sends Reds top
